summary: Customer Advocate with extensive experience in high-volume call centers and administrative roles. Proven skills in customer service, needs assessment, problem solving, scheduling, billing, and secretarial duties. Technologically proficient in Microsoft Office, accounting software, and device troubleshooting; known for reliability, confidentiality, and process improvement.

experience.title: Customer Advocate
experience.description: Answered a high volume of incoming calls in a national call center; actively listened to clients to ensure understanding; provided innovative and individualized solutions; conducted complex problem solving; accessed and updated client account databases; maintained professional telephone conversations; administered device-related troubleshooting; kept records of customer interactions; stayed up-to-date on services and products.

experience.title: Legal Secretary
experience.description: Prepared court documents, deeds, real estate transfer statements, purchase agreements, contracts, power of attorney, wills, and routine correspondence. Performed accounting duties including accounts receivable, accounts payable, time slips, monthly billing, payroll, payroll taxes, and balancing of trust accounts and estates. Greeted clients, scheduled appointments, and ensured office efficiency.

experience.title: Administrative Assistant/Customer Service Rep
experience.description: Worked directly with the President and CFO to schedule and plan meetings and events; prepared materials for board meetings; took minutes; handled board inquiries; booked travel and created itineraries.

experience.title: Retail Banking Representative II
experience.description: Provided excellent customer service for account inquiries; opened accounts; solved problems and cross-sold financial products. Scanned checks; daily balancing of drawer, ATM, vault, and total branch balancing.
